title: Couple alert! Home and Away actor Orpheus Pledger goes public with new Instagram model girlfriend
text:
Home and Away's Orpheus Pledger has a new girlfriend.

The actor is now dating aspiring Instagram model Bella Rogers.

Orpheus, 26, went public with the relationship on Sunday by posting a picture of the pair at Sydney's Bondi Beach to his Instagram account.

Couple alert! Home and Away actor Orpheus Pledger goes public with new Instagram model girlfriend

Cuddling up for the photo, Orpheus wrapped his arm around the slender brunette.

In another upload, the pair sat on Bondi's grassy knoll as they looked out towards the famous beach.

Bella commented on the pictures: 'What a sexy looking boy!'

Relaxing date: In another upload, the pair sat on Bondi's grassy knoll as they looked out towards the famous beach

'My boy is beautiful': Bella and Orpheus have commented loved-up posts on each other's accounts over the past week

'What a sexy looking boy!' Orpheus' new girlfriend Bella is surely a fan of the actor's gym-honed physique

On another photo posted by the actor, Bella wrote: 'My boy is beautiful.'

He responded: 'Aw thnx babe.'

It appears Brooke split from her last boyfriend earlier this year.

Beach babe: Brooke appears to have broken up with her last boyfriend earlier this year

Orpheus became a household name after he landed a re-occurring role on Home and Away, as a resident in the fictional beach-side town of Summer Bay.

He has also appeared on various Australian television dramas such as Blue Heelers in 2002 and 2006, McLeod's Daughters in 2005 and The Secret Life Of Us in 2001.

Given his role as personal trainer and aspiring doctor Mason Morgan on the soap, it's no surprise that Orpheus has a Summer Bay rig.
description: Home and Away's Orpheus Pledger has a new girlfriend. he actor is now dating aspiring Instagram model Bella Rogers.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
